data.sql: create temporary table tempFA select f1.CostCenter AS Cost_Center, f1.Hours AS Total_Chargable_Hours, f2.Hours AS Headcount, (f2.Hours * target_hours) AS Target_Hours, CC.Manager AS Manager from (select * from Finance where CostCenter in (select CostCenter from CC) AND Item="Total Chargeable hours (All resources)" AND EmployeeGroup='1') f1 inner join (select * from Finance where CostCenter in (select CostCenter from CC) AND Item="Headcount (Chrg. resources)" AND EmployeeGroup='1') f2 on f2.CostCenter = f1.CostCenter inner join CC on f1.CostCenter = CC.CostCenter;
select *, (Total_Chargable_Hours / Target_Hours) AS UR from tempFA order by UR limit 10;
